section.title: Android and REST based webservices
section.para: REST based webservices are based on HTTP calls. Hence you can simply the HTTP calls to perform these calls.
Several open source projects exists to simplify this handling. For example Crest, which can be found under the following URL: http://crest.codegist.org/deeper/android.html
Another popular REST framework is Restlet, which can be found under the following URL: http://www.restlet.org/

section.title: Android and SOAP based webservices
section.para: SOAP webservices are based on XML and you can handle them with pure XML. To simplify the handling of SOAP webservices you can also use Open Source projects.
Relatively popular is the ksoap2-android project, which can be found under the following link: http://code.google.com/p/ksoap2-android/wiki/Links
